parts.text: Stylized game sprite of Kelly, the Rein Maker's Daughter, full-body, neutral run pose, light linen tunic fused with delicate brass/circuit accents, short practical boots, small glowing circuit-rein brooch on chest, readable silhouette, facing right, orthographic, cel-shaded, painterly texture pass, soft forge key light, cool rim light, transparent background, master size 1024x1280 for downscaling, no background, no watermark. Negative: photo, blurry, watermark.
